ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Remember the Name of your Lord in the morning and the evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Meditate upon the name of your Lord morning and evening;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and remember the name of your Lord, morning and evening;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Mention the Name of your Lord, mornings and evenings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And remember the name of your Lord morning and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And remember the Name of your Lord every morning and afternoon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And glorify the name of your Lord morning and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And remember the Name of thy Lord at dawn and in the evening
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Remember the name of thy Lord at morn and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and glorify your Lord morning and evening;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And remember thou the name of thy Lord in the morning and in the evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and celebrate the Name of your Lord morning and evening,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And celebrate the name of thy Lord morning and evening,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And remember the Name of your Lord every morning and afternoon [i.e. offering of the Morning (Fajr), Zuhr, and 'Asr prayers].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And, remember the Name of your Lord at the dawn and in the evening;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And mention the Name of your Lord, morning and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And mention the name of your Lord [in prayer] morning and evening
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [76:25] And mention the Name of your Lord, during prayer, at dawn and with the declining of the sun, that is, at dawn (fajr), noon (zuhr) and in the afternoon (‘asr);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Remember the name of thy Lord) pray by the command of your Lord (at morn and evening) i.e. the prayers of Fajr, Zuhr and 'Asr.
